title: Ticket #101: Build/Test web pages: Better database queries
description: The report pages are doing something awful like one query per cell in the table. I haven't dug deeply, but I'm pretty sure we can do better than that, reducing wasteful load on both the database and the web server. The resulting pages will be faster to load as an added bonus. This is almost certainly tightly linked to #102: overhaul the code.
creator: adesmet
